channel.title: How do I make it on my server so the karil's bow can shoot further?
channel.description: on my server my k bow shoot's not even one inch away how do I make it shoot like a couple inches away? also my karils bow doesn't take the bolt rack's and doesn't show the bolt shoot how do I make it do this?

item.title: How do I make it on my server so the karil's bow can shoot further?
item.dc:creator: @Dan1337 Dan1337
item.description:
@Dan1337 wrote:

Is it in the list of

if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || ETC

and

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) { // Karils x-bow playerSE = 2074; playerSEA = 2075; playerSEW = 2076; playerSER = 2077;
Is there all that?

I can try and see if i can fix that, post what you got for it atm

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it on my server so the karil's bow can shoot further?

item.title: How do I make it on my server so the karil's bow can shoot further?
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

Dan1337:

Is the bow set as a bow? or when you attack with it does it look like your punching the other person with your fists?

it is set as a bow if you can help I can send you it.
